communication
Class ChunkObject

java.lang.Object
  communication.ChunkObject
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class ChunkObject
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

A class that encapsulates a chunk of the input file for each map task. This object is serializable.

See Also:
Serialized Form
